website_summaries.verdict: A tougher solution that works best with a machine.
pros: The higher price tag of this 16 oz
bottle is justified by its aggressiveness and ability to get out tougher scratches
Though it can be used by hand, it works best with a polisher
cons: This product may be too aggressive for some paints

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product! The entire BOSS line is spectacular. This fast correcting cream can easily be used without needing to follow up with the perfecting polish on most paint. You get an extremely long working time with the polish as well. I have actually used this outside in the heat on a hood with fantastic results and a long work time and NO dusting which is a huge plus for me. A product like Meguiars M105 works well but covers your car in dust! This will be a staple in my business!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nickles

customer_reviews.title: I tried the fast correcting cream and liked it much better
customer_reviews.text: After trying the regular correction cream on my black car that had etched water spots, I tried the fast correcting cream and liked it much better. It is more aggressive and really helped me eliminate my etched water spots. This car was only one year old and already had horrible water spot problems. I purchased the Griot's buffer, fast correcting cream, and finishing sealant. With a little patience and work my paint is fixed. For those hesitating, don't! I'm telling you I tried just a cleaner wax and it did nothing for my spots but the correction cream did the trick. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: abhueter

customer_reviews.title: It works and it's way easier than M105!
customer_reviews.text: I was stunned at how well this worked. I have been using M105 and I simply don't have time for that product at the volume of vehicles I'm doing. This stuff is MUCH easier to work with. Working time per panel is extended to minutes instead of seconds, hardly any dusting, and the removal is a breeze. It has saved me hours already over the course of just a few cars. Oh, and it WORKS. Removes swirls with ease (on an orange pad & da buffer).
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance, worktime and no dusting!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this stuff is amazing. 4-6 passes and it will eliminate heavy swirling, spider webs, even some RIDS even on an 8MM throw DA. Excellent working time, almost zero dusting. The Griot's BOSS system is excellent for amateurs and pros just the same. I have zero complaints about the BOSS system. To be honest I was never big into Griot's and always thought a lot of their stuff was overpriced and under-performed compared to the competition at the time. The past few years they have made huge strides and it's now my go to.
customer_reviews.author: VideoVince

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great compound for dual action use. Doesnt do too hot on a rotary, but I dont think it was formulated for that. Cuts great, leaves a dazzling finish due to the sub micron abrasives in it. Fast cut, great finish, wax ready. Only on the softest clear coat, does it leave a little micro maring haze. Can buff on this stuff all day, great working cycle. One of the best compounds out there. The boss line is phenomenal. This compound is in my top 5. As far as cut-to-finish, I'm not sure there's another compound like it. Good stuff. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dark-skinned knight

customer_reviews.title: I guess I'll drop my 105/205 combo now....
customer_reviews.text: I am a detailer by trade and I could honestly say this stuff is GRRREAAAT. I used to use M105/M205 mixed with a little lube to keep it from drying out everywhere but say no more, I just wet-sanded a silver 2014 4runner front and rear driver door with 1500/3000 and the compound pulled the scratches out extremely easy with a Lake Country yellow flat pad. No more dusting and the work time is amazing. However, I have yet to use the BOSS line polish, but it is def. next on my list of items to test!~
customer_reviews.author: Davidle1787

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product for Scratch removal
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Boss Fast Correcting Cream and Pad anticipating another waste of my money in an attempt to remove a superficial scratch from the door on my black Porsche. I am not a professional so I watched the Griot's videos on-line and gathered all the products I needed. The first step after cleaning the vehicle was the Griot's Fast Correcting Cream with the Random Orbital Buffer. After repeated steps, 90% of the scratch was gone! In the next step, I used the Finishing Sealant with the appropriate black colored pad. That removed the additional amount of the scratch. I topped it off with carnauba wax and it looks amazing! I'm a true believer in the Griot's products.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great product 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product 100% recommended. I used it to correct the paint (swirls, scratches) of my 2013 Camaro SS, this product worked fantastic, the results were beyond my expectations. I want to give credit to Dallas Paint Correction and Detail man I love your YouTube channel Two big thumbs up for you and also Amazon for amazing service!
customer_reviews.author: Dimas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have a 38 year old British car whose paint was in total disrepair. I had tried rubbing compounds, waxes, cleaners, and etc. but nothing would bring back the color , let alone the shine of my weather beaten paint. After only a few minutes of using this correcting cream, the color and shine was brought back. Was it car show concourse ready? No, but the difference was night and day. My suggestion is to watch some YouTube videos showing how to use this product and go for it. I am very glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: MG Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Create for light swirls, not much else
customer_reviews.text: I use another product as a final polish and decided to try this to speed up cutting based on the description and reviews. The label is misleading. It's quick to remove light swirls and spiderwebs but not actually cut anything more without multiple (3 or 4+ passes) at which point you're just blowing through product. The finish isn't as pristine as a specialized finish polish and it doesn't quickly correct anything that a fine polish wouldn't with a few passes on troublesome areas so for me this was a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: and it finishes down like a polish
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the most impressive cutting compound I've ever used. It cuts heavy defects that nothing else i've tried has, and it finishes down like a polish. No holograms or haze of any sort. So extremely impressed! I used this with their 5.5" microfiber cutting disks on speed 5 on a porter cable with medium pressure over 3 passes and then light pressure over 2 more. I honestly thought my fiancee's hood would need a repaint to get some really heavy defects she had in there out. It looks brand new again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great product and following online
customer_reviews.text: Great product finishes well and I didn't do a full 2 or 3 step correction. Used this coming as a one step and sealed with a ceramic coat. I'm happy about saving time. Pic is an after shot of getting a large fender scuff out from a parking lot fender bender.
customer_reviews.author: inmypassatlife

customer_reviews.title: Replace a lot of my other compound/polishing solutions
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. It’s an all in one compound/polisher that removes fine and medium scratches. Easy to work with and polishers at the end. I highly recommend this if you don’t want to do a two step paint correction. I would recommend using a speed three or four when polishing with a DA machine. I’m throwing out some of my other compound/polishers because this will replace them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Power T

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome. I'm not going to go into detail on ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I'm not going to go into detail on how to use it, there are plenty of video reviews online. The fact is that this stuff works extremely well to correct moderate defects (maybe 1000 grit equivalent) and it works fast. Super easy to buff. Almost leaves a LSP-ready finish, depending on your paint color. Best stuff I've used so far with such a wide range of correction and finishing ability.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: On my way to the paint shop
customer_reviews.text: My paint was beat almost beyond repair...so I thought. I figured I had nothing to lose, as I was dropping off my 09 Lexus for paint the next day. After a few hours in the garage with this stuff and a buffer, I was blown away. Money saved!!! Canceled that appointment. I’ve used Griots Garage products for years, and will continue to do so. Outstanding results.
customer_reviews.author: W. Price

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This the last compound you will ever need. A little pricey but well worth it. Excellent cut and leaves behind a lot of shine in gloss. Follow up with perfecting cream or finishing sealant and you have near perfect and or perfect results. No dusting , easy to take off as long as u dont use in the sun. Will leave a little marring if u use with a microfiber pad but it will go away when you finish off with one of the products mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an Amazing product Highly recommended for deep clear coat scratches
customer_reviews.text: I mean wow!!! I have been looking for a product that could get out some deep scratches from the previous owner. I just couldn't get it out with the meguires ultimate compound and would not cut that deep. I had honestly thought about wet sanding the clear but im glad I held out for this product. My paint now is 90% better.
customer_reviews.author: "Mike's Tackle Box" on YouTube

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best. First time using a DA polisher for correct the paint on my car. This stuff was amazing to work with, easy to wipe off and smelled great. My car looks better than the showroom 10 years ago. The cream was not oily afterward and had such a long working time. I live in FLORIDA so my car is never cool to the touch and this worked wonders. Can not say enough about it. It also did not whiten my black trim when I touched it. Have several Griots products and this by far my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: LAinSFLA

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the price for a full 16oz, can't go wrong with that. Lingerie working time, I used it once and worked pretty decent. I have to use more to get a feel for how aggressive it really is as I'm used to sonax cutmax. Its pretty thin so it feels like it wouldn't be effective but it works. Either way the quantity you get and price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelC

customer_reviews.title: Best compound/polish on the market today under $75.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Meguires, Turtle Wax, and even Chemicals guy’s V-Line (VSS,V32,V34,V36,V38.) I couldn’t be any happier with my purchase of the Fast correcting Cream. Took off probably 85% of defects from a very abused black paint job. Will use this for the rest of my correcting career.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Griots Product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to go wrong with anything from Griots. Had lots of working time with the product using a machine applicator. Wipes off easy. With a lightweight pad I had to make several passes on some of the areas that needed more correcting but this was expected.
customer_reviews.author: RedNinja

customer_reviews.title: BEST compound I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, it's just so effective at medium-heavy defect removal. It doesn't dust that badly, and buffs off easily. Buy this and you won't be disappointed. Note: This stuff will leave the paint scoured a bit, so follow up with a fine polish! (I love their perfecting cream for this)
customer_reviews.author: David Wetherbee

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly, outstanding product.
customer_reviews.text: This easy to use, effective product is very user friendly, even for amateurs like myself. It can be used for one-step paint correction of lightly to moderately scratched/hazed paint, and/or small scratch elimination, and it will give you outstanding results. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Treg G.

customer_reviews.title: A compound that finishes like a polish.
customer_reviews.text: Like all Griot's products, this a true winner. On most paints, the FCC will finish perfectly with no need to finish polish. Smells great, long working time, no dusting and easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Griots knocked this out of the park
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my go to product for our small detailing business. Paired with a DA and the right microfiber or foam pad. This cream is a swirl killer, and provides fantastic results. Easy on/off and long work time. Finishes down great. Love Love Love this product. Great job Griots 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: TreyNicole Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Took the swirls out of my black Colorado
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Took the swirls out of my black Colorado. I used it with a DA and a 5.5" orange Chemical Guys BUFX_102_HEX5 Hex-Logic Medium-Heavy Cutting Pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  B. Nimble

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUT I'VE EVER USED!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is down right amazing. I found this in my search for a high cut, low/no dust compound. It has a long working time and wipes off with ease. It's able to take out heavy scratches and swirls and finishes with minimal hazing. As a professional detailer I'm always looking for products that cut down my time, so this is the new addition to my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Miles ahead of meg m105 no dust !!
customer_reviews.text: Klas Premier detail By far a mile ahead of meguiars m105 Little to no dust . Corrects anything while finishing like a polish . I have yet to find a better compound. On my 5th bottle at least, my customers are always amazed at the finish , and this is the only step needed in most cases . No multiple steps needed
customer_reviews.author: matthew kush

customer_reviews.title: Can you say UNBELIEVABLE?
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I just put a tiny dab on a cloth and took out some water marks fro a rusted area where it ran down my tailgate! THEN..use a DA polisher and what happens next... It is AMAZING! Took out fading, corrected the paint everywhere and looks great! I am SOLD on this stuff! 22 year old paint looks GREAT now!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best compounds on the market. Cuts fast and finishes down very well. East to buff off. A detailers best friend
customer_reviews.author: Miracle Detailing

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. All product ps in this category seem to promise massive voodoo results. I would say if you using the product you needed it for some specific reason....So it does help.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I tried it out on my 2000 dodge dakota that looked like it hadn't been took care of. It was a dull red color, now it is a bright red color. I even used it on the hood & roof where the clear coat is GONE & it done an amazing job at making it look newish again. It removed minor scratches & some decent swirl marks.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: With a DA, It’ll easily remove heavy buffer trails after wet sanding/compounding with a rotary granted your last step was with a foam pad. I was very surprised by this .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Brought my paint back to life
customer_reviews.text: Awesone stuff. Removed all oxidation and minor scratches with a heavy cut yellow pad. I can't recommend this stuff enough. Great stuff for beginners to pros. Very safe to use with all pads.
customer_reviews.author: True Story

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked phenomenal on my boat! Was easy to use, and came off with virtually no dusting. I used a harbor freight 6” random orbital buffer with an orange pad. I followed this up with correcting cream, then topped it with collinite fleet wax 885. Take a look at the pics!
customer_reviews.author: Happy!

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome, absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff is on a whole nother level. No dusting, amazing finishing down properties, rapid defect removal. Almost don't even need to follow up with a polish because the finish it leaves is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Debra B. Gotelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used this on my RV to remove moderate oxidation. Goes on and comes off very easily. Restores the RV finish to a high gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Burton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing at correction and what a finish I used it today on multiple vehicles and my customers and myself were flawed at the end results
customer_reviews.author: Brian devolve

customer_reviews.title: 3 step chemicals I had previously been working with was much better
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well with aged single stage paint on my 87 Porsche. Made a significant improvement and compared to the 3m, 3 step chemicals I had previously been working with was much better
customer_reviews.author: JGSF

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Much less dust than other compounds. Removes minor to moderate scratches and swirl marks effectively. Easy to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Much less dust than other compounds. Removes minor to moderate scratches and swirl marks effectively. Easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: BKP

customer_reviews.title: Worth thr money. One of the best compounds
customer_reviews.text: Moderate cutting at first. The longer you work it the more cut it has. Finishes out almost to a last step finish with certain pad combinations. Very minimal dust if your on the fence about thing this product I suggest you try it!!!
customer_reviews.author: @NHG_Evo

customer_reviews.title: Never using again
customer_reviews.text: I lost my 23$ for nothing. This staff absolutely garbitch.Spend 4 hours for polishing. Nothing result. Only change color from white to brown.
customer_reviews.author: Vitali stoliarov

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great at getting out slightly larger than minor paint defects ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great at getting out slightly larger than minor paint defects without damaging the paint. Have used it on several cars now with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hard to take off!
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many products over the years and yes, this did produce a great shine to my car, but wasn’t as easy to remove after being applied by my orbital polisher.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy fast great results
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review products. This product is so amazing. I would say best on the market I have tried so far! Get this stuff if you want to do a paint correction.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Lin

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the rpms burned my paint twice
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a little more but I am not a professional would give it another shot
customer_reviews.author: Bottles

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described.  Love Griots products.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well without removing the clear coat. Pretty gentle,hard to damage finish with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Only correction compound I use, and I haven't found a better one. This thing does dust so either use more pads or clean it
customer_reviews.author: Tech1

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Cream
customer_reviews.text: On a DA random orbit polisher, this is a miracle worker. The working time seems to be infinite. It never dusts up or dries out. This is my new go to compound.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man LeSage

customer_reviews.title: Why haven’t you hit buy yet?
customer_reviews.text: Heavy hitting professional abrasive that diminishes well, work time is endless, and gets amazing work done at a great price. Smell is great as well
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Low to no dust
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on my black paint took all scratches out.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great, great shine, and best of all NO DUST!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great, great shine, and best of all NO DUST!
customer_reviews.author: Danny_SS

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Has a great smell and is easy to remove, over all a great cutting product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Family

customer_reviews.title: Great one coat
customer_reviews.text: Works very good removing swirls and finishing with high polish look. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: One of the Bests
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for removing scratches and swirls with my DA Polisher with a foam cutting pad, excited to see how it will work with a microfiber pad. Low dusting. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Pruyn

customer_reviews.title: Little dusty but performs well
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Dusts a little more than I expected but overall does what it’s meant to do...cut and finish down very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: really liked this , works great, i will be buying more, ive been happy with this brand name
customer_reviews.author: cliff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works period! Knocks out heavy scratches with ease and no dusting .
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Griots has done it again with a great product
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite polish. Cuts great with little no dusting.
customer_reviews.author: Jon A.

customer_reviews.title: Also great on restoring foggy headlights..
customer_reviews.text: This Fast Correcting Cream worked wonders on restoring my foggy headlights using the orange pad with my 5" orbital polisher. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Niko D

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to buy this, I'm barely starting out in vehicle detailing and got this recommended from others. Tried it out on one of my vehicles and the results are amazing. And leashes paint super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: chevydan89

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Correction cream on the market
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite go to correction cream I use this for my two stage jobs followed up with a polish for extreme shine But even alone this provides an elite finish
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing stuff, I use a 3m white pad on a rotorary buffer and still don't seem to get hazing or swirls on black cars. But it is very runny!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve&Kate

customer_reviews.title: if you’re a professional save your money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s OK, best attribute is there is zero dust and wipe off his easy. HD One is a far superior product leaves a much deeper gloss and depth of color.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Coddington Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No dusting
customer_reviews.text: Cuts amazing. I don't think there were any dust that I noticed. Great compound.
customer_reviews.author: jerry chanh ly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product removes all the small washing scratches and leaves the paint looking brand new and ready for sealant and wax. Made my 98 4runner look brand new again. Removed almost all the heavy scratches from brush while offroading.
customer_reviews.author: Brock J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly the best med/high cut compound I've ever used due to its long working time and minimal dusting.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Scott Uhler

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy task.
customer_reviews.text: Worked real good for removing scratches from clear coat, as long as its not too deep. Can do by hand, but works much better with the orange correcting wheel on a DA.
customer_reviews.author: char3983

customer_reviews.title: The best paint correction
customer_reviews.text: Hand down the BEST product I've used ever tried countless other brand and nothing comes close. Will try their other line
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good machine compound for ceramic coating prep.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts faster than their machine polishes when used with the BOSS microfiber pad, but not so fast that I was afraid to use it. Good results on an Infiniti G37. I ceramic coated it after buffing. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I usually never leave reviews, but this product blew me away. When paired with an orange lake country pad, I was able to bring this customers 20 year old back paint back to perfection. Highly recommend this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Watkiss

customer_reviews.title: Great for Various Paints
customer_reviews.text: Great product that can be used as a Polish and Compound. Used this on various vehicles and paints. It works the same.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for removing heavy swirl marks on a vehicles paint.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product no gimmick, fast working correction with a medium foam cutting pad.

customer_reviews.title: ... a Rupes 15 and Rupes yellow pad to correct fine scratches. The wipe off was very easy much ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well paired with a Rupes 15 and Rupes yellow pad to correct fine scratches. The wipe off was very easy much easier than other polishes.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on even the most shallow minor scratches.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended to do
customer_reviews.text: Works great on hard and soft clear. Great choice for a 1st step cut
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome compound
customer_reviews.text: Best compound I’ve used for medium to harsh defects. Get an orange cutting pad and it works so well and fast. No dusting and easy to wipe off.

customer_reviews.title: Best one step compound
customer_reviews.text: Once you try it, youll never use anything else again

customer_reviews.title: Great for cut and cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Cuts fast and leaves no dust. Whats not to like.

customer_reviews.title: Works !
customer_reviews.text: Works great . I used a hex logic orange pad, did the job. Good product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for the deep scratches. Long working time with very low dust.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Top came broken, didn't realize that until I went to use it, but like the product

customer_reviews.title: Griots the best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best compounds,I finished with griots one step sealant and see the result,my windstar 1999 now is glossy and shine,awesome products!!!!

customer_reviews.text: Great product... Removed paint oxidation & swirls better than any off the shelf products

customer_reviews.text: My go to for big corrections & easy swirl removal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Removed heavy oxidation from roof of truck easily. Very little dust and wipes off with little effort. Use with Griot's B110F6 fast correcting pad. Sealed with Griot's Garage paint sealant.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: Best compound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, worked much better and faster than any other compound I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Starr

customer_reviews.title: I did not have to repaint the roof
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well on my car that had clear coat that turning white, it restored I to shine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely reorder. Brings back the paint on our vintage cars.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Verstegen

customer_reviews.title: No Dust but Less Cut than M105
customer_reviews.text: Great product with long working time and no dust (unlike M105); however, I felt like it did not cut as well as M105. I used this with a MF pad on Griots 6" DA polisher and am comparing the cut to M105 on orange foam pad.
customer_reviews.author: Mrunal

customer_reviews.title: Incredible red bottle of awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Polishes like no other, cleans up well and is almost dummy proof to use and get a great result!
customer_reviews.author: Brady Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. Did everything I wanted it to do

product_meta.title: Griot's Garage B110P BOSS Fast Correcting Cream 16oz
product_meta.description: Size:16 OunceIf your paint is tore up from the floor up our BOSS Fast Correcting Cream will make quick work of removing the most severe defects, adding depth and clarity to your paint. This is the bottle you reach for when you have a lot of serious scratches, swirls, and oxidation then, for future polishing sessions, you will likely move to a less aggressive formula as you prepare your paint for perfecting and sealing. A BOSS Fast Correcting Foam Pad or BOSS Microfiber Pad, our most aggressive BOSS pads, are recommended for use with BOSS Fast Correcting Cream. However, the Best Of Show System is designed so you can use a softer BOSS pad to reduce the aggressiveness of the cream. We’ve poured 25 years of pursuing perfection in each bottle of BOSS cream we produce so you can cut to the chase when it comes your paint correction journey.
feature_bullets: No silicones or fillers to hide defects.
Smooth application and extended working time.
Faster defect removal vs comparable competitive products.
Pleasant scent for improved user experience.
